title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.3. ENABLING ENVIRONMENT NUTRITION

description.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the necessary capacity to develop strategic and operational nutrition plans and strategies and to plan, budget and coordinate nutrition interventions utilizing a human-rights based approach, which contributes to Early Detection And Treatment Of Malnutrition, Nutrition And Emergencies, Nutrition In Early Childhood, Nutrition Of Adolescents And Women, Nutrition â€“ General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2. By the end of 2022, adolescents, pregnant and breastfeeding women, mothers and children aged 0-5 years make greater use of quality nutritional services and adopt adequate nutrition and feeding practices in 15 provinces.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2021, national, regional and local authorities have the necessary capacity to develop strategic and operational nutritionplans and strategies and to plan, budget and coordinate nutrition interventions utilizing a human-rights based approach

description.narrative: A situational analysis of the salt iodization programme carried out in partnership with the Iodine Global Network allowed to develop a national reinforcement plan. The Intersectoral Action Plan for Nutrition and Food was revised in 2021 as part of the implementation of the SUN Movement in Chad. The celebration of the 2021 World Breastfeeding Week under the theme, ‘Protect Breastfeeding: A Shared Responsibility’, allowed to reach the population at a national scale with SMS messages, in partnership with the telecommunication operators Airtel and Mov Africa. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:22/01/2022
